[\[1b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na maHtsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/_rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i cho gas rang ngam 'gro ba gzhan gyi gdon dang nad rnams las grol bar 'dod pa'i rdo rje

[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]gser dang dngul lam ma rnyed na zangs sam sa las byas kyang rung ste/_lto ba che la mgrin pa ring ba zhabs zhum pa kha yel ba/_nag po ra ri med pa/_grangs lha grangs dang mthun pa drug gam/_yang na bdun nam gcig kyang
[\[2a.2\]]rung ste/_gu gul gyis bdugs pa dang /_yungs kar gyis bgegs bzlog la/_der 'o ma dang chu nyung zad blugs pa der rin po che rnams dang /_dri lnga dang /_sman lnga dang 'bru lngas dgang la mgrin pa gos kyi shing las byung ba'i kha tshar phun tshar ma
[\[2a.3\]]nyams pa'i mthing shun gyis kha bsgyur ba'am/_dkar po gsar zhing gtsang bas mgul pa bcings la/_me tog sngon po dang bcas pas kha brgyan la mgul pa ras kyi steng du yungs kar dang rtswa dUr ba nyag ma bdun dang bcas pa dri zhim po'i me
[\[2a.4\]]tog phreng bas bcings la/_mdud pa la hUM bris pa'i ba'i lci bas lam lhung bas so/_/gdugs dang ba dan kyang ngo /_/de nas maN+Dal gyi steng du gzhag go/_/yang khrus dang 'thor 'thung nye reg byas la/_las kyi rdo rje dang /_gsang gdub dang /_gdu
[\[2a.5\]]bu'i cho ga rnams byas la/_der rang gi snying gar nyi ma la sa bon bltas pa des rigs gsum 'khor dang bcas pa dmigs la/_bde bar gshegs pa dam pa'i chos/_/tshogs chen bcas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gtum po phyag na rdo rje la/_/khyad par
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]du yang phyag 'tshal lo/_/yid 'ong mchod rdzas ji snyed rnams/_/rigs gsum 'khor dang bcas la 'bul/_/'khor ba thog ma med pa nas/_/da lta sdig pa bgyis pa dang /_/bgyid du stsal dang yi rang ba/_/shin tu 'gyod pas bshags shing sdom/_/bdag dang gzhan
[\[2b.2\]]gyis gang bgyis pa'i/_/dge ba kun la rjes yi rang /_/byang chub snying po nyer gnas te/_/gang yang byang chub mchog rtogs pa'i/_/bdag gis gsol ba rgyal ba kun/_/'khor lo dam pa bskor du gsol/_/bya ba thams cad byas nas ni/_/sangs rgyas mya ngan 'da' ba
[\[2b.3\]]rnams/_bdag gis gsol ba rgyal ba kun/_/sangs rgyas mya ngan mi 'da' gsol/_/phyag 'tshal la sogs bsod nams gang /_/ji snyed bdag gis bgyis pa rnams/_/ji ltar mgon pos mkhyen pa ltar/_/byang chub tu ni yongs su bsngo'o/_/de nas rang gis rang ma rtogs pa
[\[2b.4\]]stong par bsgom/_a ser pos gser gyi sa gzhir bsam/_de'i steng du baM las 'o ma can gyi rgya mtsho bsam/_de nas suM las ri rab/_de steng du b+h+rUM las gzhal yas khang gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa rta babs dang bcas pa/_dbus dang mtshams bzhir 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi dang phyogs bzhi ni
[\[2b.5\]]gri gug bzhis mtshan pa'o/_/de'i dbus su raM las stong par song ba'i ngang las chos thams cad rdul dang bral ba'i sgra byung bar bsam/_oM badzra dz+wa lA na lA ya swA hA/_de las sna tshogs rdo rje ngos gcig med pa/_de las rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi skur grub/_sku yongs su rdzogs pa ni sku mdog ljang
[\[2b.6\]]sngon yid tsam khro ba/_g.yas na rdo rje rgya gram la ngos gcig med pa thugs kar 'dzin pa/_g.yon dkur brten cing 'gying ba/_mgul rgyan dang dpung brgyan la sogs pa dang ldan pa/_stod g.yogs dar la smad g.yogs dang tshi gu can bsnams pa'o/_/oM tsu ru tsu ru tsaN+Da ki li kI lA
[\[2b.7\]]ya swA hA/_oM trA sa ya trA sa ya badzra ki li kI lA ya swA hA/_oM ha ra ha ra badzra d+ha rA ya swA hA/_oM pra ha ra pra ha ra badzra pra b+hany+dza nA ya swA hA zhes pa las/_dbang ldan dang me dang srin po dang rlung rnams kyi 'khor lo'i steng du go rims bzhin du rdo rje gdengs pa dang /_rdo rje ka na ka dang /_rdo rje be con dang /_
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]rdo rje tho ba rnams so/_/de rnams la go rims bzhin du rdo rje gtum mo dang /_rdo rje ki li kI la dang /_rdo rje be con dang /_rdo rje tho ba rnams kyi skur grub po/_/khro bo rdo rje gtum po smug nag bzhin khro gnyer can/_g.yas pa khro bo rdo rje rtse lnga pa phyar te thogs pa'o/_/
[\[3a.2\]]lha thams cad g.yon bstan nas 'gying ba'o/_/rdo rje ki li kI la ya mdog ljang nag khro gnyer can/_g.yas na rdo rje rtse gcig pa/_rdo rje be con mthing nag khro gnyer can/_smar ser po can/_g.yas na be con gyi rtse mo rdo rjes mtshan pa/_rdo rje tho ba mdog nag po shin tu khro ba mche ba
[\[3a.3\]]gtsigs pa/_g.yas na rdo rje tho ba thogs pa'o/_/de nas mchod yon lag tu thogs te/_dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis/_/tshur gshegs tshur gshegs khro rgyal rnams/_/bdag la mchod yon pa zhes nas kyang /_/bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_/oM A ha ra A ha ra
[\[3a.4\]]sarba bid+ya d+ha ra swA hA zhes pas mchod yon gyis spyan drangs la rang la bstims la/_phyag rgya gsum gyis rgyas gdab ste/_gong ma'i sngags lnga brjod cing lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar la srin lag gnyis nang du bkug la phan tshun bsnol ba'i rtse mo mdzub mo'i drung du cung zad byung
[\[3a.5\]]bar byas la/_gung mo gshibs pa'i phyi rol nas mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste/_bar nas gang tsam gyis ma reg par byas la/_mthe bong gnyis gshibs pa ni rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi'o/_/g.yon pa ni sdigs mdzub snying gar bzhag pa/_g.yas pa sor mo gsum bsgreng la mthe chung gi sen
[\[3a.6\]]mo mtheb mos mnan pa'o/_/lag pa gnyis khu tshur nang du bcings la/_cung zad bsnol ba'i tshul du bcug ste/_mthe bong gnyis gyen du gshibs la bsgreng ngo /_/lag pa thal mo phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo sbyar ba las/_mthe bong gnyis bsgreng ste tshigs pa bkug nas srin
[\[3a.7\]]lag gi drung du gzugs so/_/lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs te mthe bong gnyis bsgrengs/_mthe'u chung gnyis nang du gzhug go/_/phyag rgya chen po rnams gong ma bzhin bsgoms pas rgyas gdab/_de nas mchod pa dang bstod pa bya/_de nas b+h+rUM las rin po che'i bum pa la nang
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]'o ma can gyi rgya mtsho las pad+ma 'khrungs par bsams la pad+ma'i steng du zla ba/_de'i steng du sngags lngas lha lnga bskyed la ye shes kyi lha rnams mchod yon gyis spyan drangs la bstim/_phyag rgya gsum gyis rgyas btab nas mchod bstod byas la/_bum pa'i steng du bzhag
[\[3b.2\]]la/_de la gzungs thag btags la/_rang dang lha'i thugs kar sngar gyi sngags lnga po gang zlos pa gsal bar dmigs la/_phreng ba snyim par bcug la gzungs thag nas bzung la/_oM badzra a ts+tshin+d+ha ye swA hA zhes brjod la phreng ba lag pa g.yas pas bzung la so so'i sngags
[\[3b.3\]]bzlas pas yi ge phreng ba gzungs thag la 'khril nas ye shes sems dpa' mnyes shing bum par ye shes kyi chu rgyun gyis khengs par bsam/_thun rel glal dang sbrid pa gsang sbubs la sogs pa spangs la ma yengs par 'dzab tu dbul lo/_/glal la sogs byung na khrus sogs byas la bzlas pa bskyar/_
[\[3b.4\]]yang na kun la thun mong du yang snying thun re la brgya rtsa brgyad dam ji ltar nus pa dbul/_de nas mchod bstod byas la/_phyi rol du dpung bzangs las 'byung ba bzhin gtor ma btang la/_lus ngag gi kun spyod bya/_thun gnyis phan chod la rang khrus sogs byas la mchod bstod bzlas pa bya'o/_/
[\[3b.5\]]thun tha ma la mchod bstod gtor ma btang ba'i rjes la bzod par gsol la/_slar yang bdag la nges par ni/_/rjes su bzung bar mdzad nas kyang /_/mgon po rig dang sngags bcas pas/_/ci bde bar ni gshegs su gsol/_/zhes thabs kyi ye shes pa gshegs su gsol/_/
[\[3b.6\]]khro bo bzhi bo rang la bsdu/_rang bdud rtsi 'khyil par bsgyur la nyal/_yang tho rangs khrus dang 'thor 'thung nye reg dang las kyi rdo rje cho ga nas bzung la thams cad sngar bzhin byas la/_me long gi ngos ltar mnyam pa la rnam lnga dang dri zhim pos byugs las gzung bya'o/_/de nas khrus dang
[\[3b.7\]]'thor 'thung nye reg byas la/_sa gzung nyi ma nas brtsams te/_/slob ma dkyil 'khor 'jug gi bar/_/slob dpon rtogs par 'jug par bya/_/dri dang bcas pa'i zas bza' zhing /_/zhes gsungs pas/_smyung ba la gnas pa'am/_yang dkar gsum la dris bsgos pa nyung zad
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]tsam bza'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi dbus sam nub phyogs su ku sha'i stan la 'dug ste/_lha drug gi sgo nas rang lha lngar bskyed cing ye shes bcug nas rgya gsum gyis btab pa la/_shar phyogs nas slob ma'am yon gyi bdag pos khrus la sogs pa byas nas
[\[4a.2\]]gos gtsang zhing gsar pa gon la me tog gi phreng ba dri zhim pos bsgos pa lag tu thogs la tsog pur 'dug ste/_mdo sde dam pa mnyan par bya/_/mdo sde 'di yi gzi brjid kyis/_/srog chags 'byung po thams cad kyi/_/mi bzad pa yi nad rnams kyang /_/de dag thams cad zhi bar
[\[4a.3\]]blta/_/tshe dang bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur/_/sdig pa kun las rnam par thar/_/de bas rdo rje rigs mchog gis/_/rnam 'joms dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol/_/zhes dang ba'i dad pa dang ldan pas lan gsum gsol ba gdab bo/_/de nas sngags 'chang 'greng ste/_
[\[4a.4\]]rang gi lha'i 'khor lo nam mkha' la bteg la/_rang bdud rtsi 'khyil par bsgyur la/_mig la hUM bkod la nyi zla 'bar bar bya zhing /_rkang pa gnyis su hUM las sna tshogs rdo rje kha gyes par bsams la/_se gol gyi sgra brdabs shing khro bo'i lta bas phyogs mtshams thams cad lta zhing
[\[4a.5\]]rdo rje lan gsum du gsor la/_e ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/thugs rje can gyi thabs chen de/_/zhi yang sems can gdul don du/_/dri ma med pa'i khro bor gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das bdud rtsi 'khyil ba de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags ring brjod do/_/
[\[4a.6\]]de nas seng ldeng gi phur bu stong bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i rnam pa la smad zur gsum par 'dug pa la/_na ma rat+na tra yA ya nas/_kro d+ha kro d+ha ki li kI lA ya swA hA zhes bya ba'i bar lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gam brgya rtsa brgyad dam ma nus na lan gsum btab la/_dbus dang mtshams bzhir gdab/_
[\[4a.7\]]cod pan dang tsan+dan dmar pos thig le gsum dang gu gul dang /_yungs kar dang /_dri sngon du 'gro ba'i mchod pa lnga dang /_dbu'i gtsug tor rnams rdzogs par bya'o/_/de nas brtan ma lhag gnas bya ste/_g.yas pa'i srin lag gi haM gis bkug la/_dri sngon du song ba'i rnam
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]lngas mchod la/_spos thogs la/_skyob pa sangs rgyas la sogs kyis/_/mkhyen pa gsol ba lan gsum bya/_/de nas lha lnga'i sa dang /_phyogs skyong gi gnas su dri'i thig le dang me tog gi tshom bu byas la lha lnga nam mkha' nas phab la bzhugs su gsol/_phyogs skyong
[\[4b.2\]]rnams yid tsam mam/_yang na/_ri rgyal gnya' shing 'dzin gyi tshul lto nas/_/phyogs skyong 'jig rten skyong ba bzhugs so 'tshal/_/bstan pa rgyas pa'i slad du spyan 'dren na/_/log 'dren gzhom pa'i slad du 'dir gshegs shig_/e h+ye hi da sha lo ka sa pa ri bA ra sa ma ya s+t+waM
[\[4b.3\]]zhes brjod do/_/de nas mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod cing bstod pa kun gyis kyang bstod la/_bum pa gtsang ma 'dir bca' zhing bum pa la mchod la/_brgya rtsa brgyad dam nyi shu rtsa gcig tu snga ma bzhin du bzlas so/_/yon bdag dang slob ma yang khrus la sogs pa byed du bcug
[\[4b.4\]]la/_gsum la skyabs 'gro sbyin/_gtor ma btang la pus mo g.yas pa btsugs la/_dril bu gsil zhing rdo rje dang spos thogs la/_/rdo rje rnam 'joms bcom ldan 'das/_/rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/rig rgyal khro bo'i tshogs rnams dang /_/gang yang gsang
[\[4b.5\]]sngags lha rnams dang /_/'jig rten skyong ba mthu chen rnams/_/ma lus bdag la dgongs su gsol/_/rdo rje rnam 'joms dkyil 'khor ni/_/'gro ba'i sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir/_/khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/_/yo byad ci 'byor pas 'dri na/_/khyod kyis
[\[4b.6\]]gnang ba mdzad pa dang /_/las kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol/_/zhes lan gsum brjod/_nyi ma 'char ka sngags 'chang g.yog dang bcas pa thig ji lta ba bzhin du bsgrubs la/_ye shes kyi thig dang las kyi thig dang /_kun la slob dpon kha nub tu lta ba lhag ma'o/_/seng ldeng
[\[4b.7\]]gi phur bus dbus su btab la/_srad bu brtod pas bskor phyogs su/_rnam 'joms kyi gnas cha chen gcig la bskor/_mu khyud cha bran lnga pa bskor/_de nas lha snam la thug pa la 'khor lo'i mu khyud cha bran gnyis bskor/_de nas phyi rol rdo rje ra ba dang me ri rta babs kyi phyi

[\[5a.1\]]rol du cha bran gnyis gnyis la bskor/_de nas 'grus thig btab la 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi'i thig btab/_phyogs bzhir gri gug re bya/_de nas tshon bsgrubs la/_phyogs tshon la shar dkar/_lho ser/_nub dmar/_byang ljang /_dbus mthing /_
[\[5a.2\]]'khor lo bzhi dang gri gug sngo skya/_pad+ma rA ga dang por sngo/_/de'i phyi rol ljang /_de'i phyi rol dmar/_de'i phyi rol ser/_kun gyi phyi rol dkar po/_de nas 'khor lo'i dbus dang 'dab ma rnams la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor re re bris la/_dbus su rdo rje rgya gram ljang sngon la
[\[5a.3\]]ngos gcig med pa bri/_byang shar gyi rtsibs la rdo rje rtse lnga pa smug nag_/shar lho'i rtsibs la rdo rje rtse gcig pa ljang nag_/lho nub kyi rtsibs la be con mthing nag_/nub byang gi rtsibs la tho ba nag po bri/_'khor lo'i mu khyud dkar po la/_gru chad ljang gu la bum pa bri/_lha'i snam
[\[5a.4\]]bur phyogs skyong dgod/_/de yang gsang ba'i spyi rgyud las/_/brgya byin gyi ni rdo rjer gsungs/_/me lha'i phyag mtshan me thab yin/_/gshin rje yi ni be con te/_/bden bral gyi ni ral gri ste/_/chu bdag gi ni zhags par bya/_/rlung lha'i phyag mtshan rgyal mtshan yin/_/ku be+e ra
[\[5a.5\]]yid byug sngon no/_/dbang phyug gi ni tri shU la/_/sa yi lha mo bum pa'o/_/nyi zla'i phyag mtshan de nyid do/_/de rnams gdan byas pa'i steng du dgod par bya'o/_/de nas sgo bzhir nub kyi sgor dpal be'u dang 'khor lo/_byang gi sgor gdugs dang rgyal mtshan/_shar gyi sgor
[\[5a.6\]]pad+ma dang bum pa/_lho'i sgor dung dang nya bri/_de nas rta babs la sogs rdzogs par ro/_/de nas dkyil 'khor gyi gnas rnam lnga dang dri zhim pos nye bar byugs la/_bla re dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_lhab lhub kyis dkyil 'khor gyi gnas brgyan cing /_me tog sil ma
[\[5a.7\]]gtor zhing mchod pa'i yan lag thams cad bshams la dra phur bres la/_de nas sngags 'chang bdag nyid khrus la sogs pa thams cad la/_nub sgor rtsa ku sha'i stan la 'dug la/_las kyi rdo rje'i cho ga dang gsang gdub dang gdu bu'i cho ga rnams byas la maN+Dal blang la mtshan ma
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]dang sta gon gyi lha bsres la/_me tog sngon po'i phreng ba thogs la rdo rje dril bu dkrol zhing /_oM badzra dz+wa lA na lA ya swA hA zhes brjod cing lan gsum gsum bskor ba byas la/_me tog rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi dbu la phul/_slar rang gi mgo la bcings la/_nub sgor 'greng la khro bo'i bstod
[\[5b.2\]]pa btang la/_bgegs la la zhig sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor la/_dngos grub kyi bar chad rtsom pa/_rig pa'i rgyal bo drag po'i rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba 'dis mgo bo tshal pa bdun du 'gas so zhes brjod cing /_a mo g+ha badzra/_oM h+ye hi badzra zhes pa nas badzra rA ga dz+wa lA ya
[\[5b.3\]]swA hA'i bar du lan cig brjod pas mtshams bcad/_de nas sngags 'chang nub sgor ku sha'i gdan nyid la bsdad la/_dril bu gsil zhing sbos snod thogs la/_ye shes bskal ba me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od/_/ma rig 'dod pa'i bdud khams thams cad bsregs/_/zhe sdang gshin
[\[5b.4\]]rje'i 'jig rten thams cad 'joms/_/log 'dren srin po ma lus gdul ba yin/_/dpa' bo dpa' mtshan stag lpags rlon pa gsol/_/rig pa'i rgyal po khro bo bzhugs so 'chal/_/log 'dren 'joms pa'i slad du spyan 'dren gyis/_/'gro ba'i don phyir mchod kyis gshegs su
[\[5b.5\]]gsol/_/badzra bi dA ra ma hA kro d+ha sa pa ri bA ra sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod/_de nas mchod yon phul la/_dam tshig la ye shes gzhug pa ni ma tis+thi ra badzra/_shru tis+thi ra badzra/_pra tis+thi ra badzra/_ma hA badzra/_a pra ti ha ta badzra zhes pas bzhugs su gsol/_de nas dam tshig chen po de'i phyag
[\[5b.6\]]rgya bstan te/_lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong mthe'u chung mnan la lhag ma rdo rje rtse gsum pa'i tshul du bsgreng ba'o/_/oM shaM ka re ma hA sa ma ye swA hA zhes brjod pa ni dam tshig chen po'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/_/de nas phyag rgya gsum gyis gdab/_de nas bum pa sngar bzhin bzlas la gzhug
[\[5b.7\]]go/_/dam tshig gso ste lag pa gnyis rgyab tu thal mo sbyar ba'i tshul du byas la mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis so sor 'khyud la lte ba'i thad kar bzhag la/_oM badzrod b+ha ba ya swA hA zhes brjod pa rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig bskang zhing gso ba'o/_/sku khrus gsol/_mchod yon phul/_

[\[6a.1\]]dri sngon du 'gro bas rnam lnga dbul/_'dod yon dang rin po che sna bdun dang /_'phra mchod dbul/_de nas bstod de/_chos nyid stong pa gnyis med ngang nyid las/_/'jig rten spyod pa'i tshul yang mi spong ste/_/thabs la mkhas pa'i 'jigs byed skur ston pa/_
[\[6a.2\]]khro chen 'bar ba'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/ye shes zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang /_/sku yi cha lugs za byed rngam stabs can/_/gsung gi nga ro 'brug stong ldir ba'i sgra/_/ma lus dbang du sdud la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/lha yi ye shes rol pas rab ston cing /_bsdigs pa'i
[\[6a.3\]]mtshon cha mang po phyag na bsnams/_/nyon mongs dug chen sna tshogs 'joms mdzad pa/_/dug sbrul rgyan gyis brgyan la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/hUM gtum chen 'bar ba bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar/_/khro gnyer glog stong 'od zer 'gyur ba bzhin/_/rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug stong
[\[6a.4\]]bzhin du sgrogs/_/khro rgyal bgegs tshogs 'dul la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas/_/dpa' bo'i stong stabs brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs/_/nyi zla 'bar ba'i spyan gyi sdang mig gis/_/bgegs dpung sreg par mdzad la phyag

[\[15a.1\]]nA ma/_bod skad du/_rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i khrus kyi cho ga zhes bya ba/_las rnams bzhi po mthar phyin pa/_/phrin las rnam bzhi'i sku la 'dud/_/bum mang bca' bar mi nus la/_/phrin las rnam pa bzhi po yi/_/bum gcig cho ga bstan par bya/_/rgyud nas
[\[15a.2\]]phrin las rnam bzhi gsungs/_/bum gcig cho ga rnam pa bzhi/_/sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis/_/bum gcig cho ga bcu gnyis 'gyur/_/zhi ba dkar dang rgyas pa ser/_/dbang ni dmar dang drag po nag_/bum pa mgul chings gzungs thag sogs/_/las dang mthun par 'gyur
[\[15a.3\]]byas te/_/gu gul tsan+dan dud pa dang /_/las bzhi yi ni sngags dang ni/_/shin tu bsdus pa'i sngags kyis ni/_/bum pa bdug cing bsang ba bya/_/rgyu bzang bum pa tshad ldan nang /_/sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge ni/_/so so'i tshon gyis bris nas ni/_/sku gsung thugs ni gang byed pa'i/_/
[\[15a.4\]]yi ge rdzas dang bcas pa ni/_/ras su gtums te bum nang gzhug_/nad dang mtshon dang mu ge yi/_/bskal pa de dag sel byed cing /_/sman lnga rin chen 'bru lnga yis/_/bum pa yang ni dgang bar bya/_/tshul khrims dang ldan mchog yin phyir/_/dri dang snying pos bum pa bkang /_/de
[\[15a.5\]]sogs bum rdzas sna tshogs btsal/_/bum pa rnams ni rgyan gyis brgyan/_/bum pa la ni gdugs bu dbub/_/zhi ba yi ni maN+Dal ni/_/pad+ma dkar po 'dab brgyad pa/_/rgyas pa rin chen ser po sna tshogs can/_/dbang la pad+ma dmar po lcags kyus mtshan/_/drag po la ni mthing nag
[\[15a.6\]]rtsibs brgyad do/_/bum gcig cho ga bsdus pa yis/_/gzhan gyi don ni byed gyur na/_/dkyil 'khor chen po bshams nas ni/_/zhi ba'i maN+Dal shar du bri/_/rgyas pa'i lho dang dbang gi nub/_/drag po byang du bri ba ste/_/bum pa yang ni de der dgod/_/mchod dang gtor ma rgyas par
[\[15a.7\]]bsham/_/ku sha'i stan ni gding bya ste/_/slob dpon smyung bar gnas pa'am/_/yang na dkar gsum zas la brten/_/gtsang ma'i gos sogs khrus byas te/_/bde ba'i stan la 'dug byas te/_/badzra bcu yis mtshams bcad de/_/rang snying bsil la hUM dgod de/_/de 'od bde
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]gshegs spyan drangs te/_/mkha' la gsal bkod bdun rdzogs bya/_/chos nyid ngang gnas de rjes la/_/drag po'i hUM sgra stong zil gnon/_/stong gsum g.yo ldan mkha' 'byung bsam/_/de rjes hUM 'od ldan pa ni/_/nam mkha' la ni bsam par bya/_/de las yaM baM laM suM chad/_/
[\[15b.2\]]de dag rim gyis zhu gyur pas/_/rlung mtsho sa ri rgyal por 'gyur/_/de steng AHhUM baM zhu bas/_/zla nyi pad+ma'i gdan du gyur/_/de steng hUM babs zhu gyur pas/_/sna tshogs pa yi rdo rje la/_/phyogs gcig yu bar gyur par bsam/_/de 'od bde gshegs mtha' dag bsdus/_/de gyur
[\[15b.3\]]rdo rje snying po'o/_/sku ljang spyan gsum phyag gnyis pa/_/g.yas pa rdo rje rgya gram pa/_/ngos gcig yu bar 'dzin pa'i tshul/_/g.yon pa sdigs mdzub thugs kar 'dzin/_/g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang gar gyis bzhugs/_/dbu skra gyen brdzes klu rigs brgyan/_/mche gtsigs
[\[15b.4\]]phyag rdor sprul pa bsgom/_/de nas bum pa'i nang du ni/_/a zhu bas ni bdud rtsi'i mtsho/_/de steng a zhu zla ba bsam/_/de steng so so'i kha dog dang /_/ldan pa'i yi ge hUM bsam mo/_/gsung sgrub de la dmigs te sgrub/_/de zhu sna tshogs rdo rje la/_/phyogs gcig yu bar gyur par bsam/_/
[\[15b.5\]]kha dog las dang mthun pa'o/_/thugs sgrub de la dmigs te sgrub/_/de zhu rdo rje snying po ni/_/sngon lta bar ni bsam par bya/_/de nas ye shes spyan drangs te/_/hUM 'jigs bcas lcang lo can gyi gnas mchog nas/_/rig sngags gsang sngags kun gyi bdag po ste/_/khro rgyal
[\[15b.6\]]rdo rje 'dzin gyi rab sprul pa'i/_/khro rgyal rdo rje snying po gshegs su gsol/_/ha ra ha ra badzra bi dA ra NA ya swA hA/_pra ha ra pra ha ra badzra pra b+ha ny+dza nA ya swA hA/_sngon lha'i ye shes spyan drangs te/_/phyag rgya bzhi yis gnyis med bya/_/badzra brgyad dang kI la lnga/_/badzra bdun sogs brjod byas pas/_/
[\[15b.7\]]sku gsung thugs sogs byin gyis brlab/_/thugs hUM las byas bde gshegs bkug_/na masma man sngags sogs kyis/_/khro bo la ni dbang bskur bsam/_/na mo rat+na tra yA yas/_/bum pa'i lha la phyag kyang bya/_/mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag mchod/_/de mchod sku ni gsal
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]bar bsgom/_/sku sgrub de la dmigs te sgrub/_/de nas gzungs sngags rim pa gsum/_/mos pa'i bye brag bzlas par bya/_/nges skyo gtor btang ye shes dbyung /_/dam tshig bum lha 'od du zhu/_/rang nyid lha yi nga rgyal bya/_/de nas gzungs mchog ces bya ba
[\[16a.2\]]ni/_/kun khyab gzungs chog bzhin du bya'o/_/yang na 'di ltar bya ba ste/_/shis brjod mang du byas nas ni/_/byab cing bsrung ba'i cho ga bya/_/rgyud kyi sbyor tshig la sogs pa/_/khrus chog rgyas par shes par bya'o/_/de ltar bum gcig ma'i cho ga bsdus pa'am/_dgos pa'i bye brag
[\[16a.3\]]gis shes par bya'o/_/bdag blo shin tu dman gyur kyang /_/rgyud 'di nyid dang mi 'gal ba'i/_/las bzhi'i bum gcig cho ga 'bad/_/'bad pas dge ba ci bsags pa/_/'gro rnams re 'dod bskang bar shog_/kun kyang 'di la 'jug gyur cig_/slob dpon chen po rat+na
[\[16a.4\]]kI rtis mdzad pa'i/_rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i khrus kyi cho ga rdzogs so//_//bal po'i paN+Di ta ma hA pa Na'i rang 'gyur ro//_//drag po'i gtso bum 'di skad do/_/cis kyang mi chod mi shigs pa/_/bden pa sra ba brtan pa ste/_/thams cad du ni thogs pa med/_/thams cad du
[\[16a.5\]]ni ma pham pa/_/shes rab thugs kyi rang bzhin te/_/sems can thams cad skrag par byed/_/sems can thams cad 'jil bar byed/_/rig sngags thams cad gcod par byed/_/gdon rnams thams cad brlag par byed/_/sems can thams cad rengs byed pa/_/kI li kI la'i
[\[16a.6\]]sngags dang ni/_/tra ta ya yi sngags sogs kyis/_/phrin las drag po'i las mthar phyin/_/khro rgyal rdo rje rnam 'joms mthus/_/drag po'i bum chu 'di yis ni/_/dri ma thams cad dag gyur cig_/phrin las drag po mthar phyin shog_/[{D2942}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_
[\[16a.7\]]badzra bi dA ra Na maN+Dal bi d+hi nA ma/_bod skad du/_rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/_dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sdug bsngal la sogs dag par mdzad pa ste/_/rnam par 'joms pa khro bo rnams kyi rje btsun nyid/_/dpal ldan
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]yid khros log lta gcod pa'i dpal/_/rdo rje bsnams pa las 'joms 'jigs byed pa'i/_/le'u'i grangs la nges pa'i snying po ste/_/brgya rtsa brgyad kyi rtsa bar 'di gsungs thog ma'o/_/de nyid dkyil 'khor cho ga las kyi rim pa nyid/_/'di nyid du ni rnam par bshad par bya'o/_/
[\[16b.2\]]sa yi cho ga go rims ltar/_/gzhan gyi las kyi rim par dbye/_/sa stegs 'dom gang gru bzhi la/_/phyogs mtshams ma nor legs par mnyam/_/'khrul ba med pa'i blo yis bya/_/dpangs su chag gang brtsig par bya/_/srad bu mnyam ldan sum sgril la/_/byin gyis
[\[16b.3\]]brlabs te g.yas nas gdab/_/cha chen cha bran mkhas pas dbye/_/tshon sna lnga yi phye ma la/_byin gyis brlabs la legs par dgod/_/dang po pad+ma 'dab brgyad la/_/gnyis pa'i cha la 'khor lo brgyad/_/mu khyud rdo rje'i ra ba dang /_/gru chad snam bu gnyis pa dang /_/sgo dang sgo khyud
[\[16b.4\]]ldan par bri/_/de nyid kha dog nges par ni/_/pad+ma dkar po 'khor lo dmar/_/mu khyud bzhi pa dkar po la/_/rdo rje rnams ni lcags dang mtshungs/_/gru chad gnyis ni ljang gu la/_/snam bu dang po ser po ste/_/de bzhin gnyis pa dkar po che/_/sgo bzhi so so'i rigs dang sbyar/_/lha
[\[16b.5\]]rnams so so'i phyag mtshan ni/_/so so'i gnas su dgod par bya/_/de nas slob ma dbang bskur ba'i/_/dgos pa dag ni tshang ba la/_/dkyil 'khor grub pa'i rdzas nyid ni/_/seng ldeng phur ba sor brgyad pa/_/bzhi pa phyogs kyi bzlas pa bya/_/dkyil 'khor gyi ni ngos bzhir gdab/_/
[\[16b.6\]]tshon sna lnga yi skud pas sbrel/_/gser dngul zangs lcags bum pa nyid/_/tshad dang ldan pa dag pa la/_/gtsang ma'i gos kyis dkris shing dgang /_/'bras bu 'dab mar ldan pa yi/_/kha rgyan ldan pa lnga nyid la/_/so so'i mtshan ma btab la gzhag_/las kyi bum pa sna tshogs
[\[16b.7\]]pa'i/_/rdo rje rgya gram de bzhin no/_/sgrub po bdag nyid mdun du yang /_/mchod pa'i yo byad ci 'byor bsham/_/nya dang bu ram sran chung 'bras/_/khre dang tshe la sogs pa yi/_/gtor ma gsum ni g.yas na gzhag_/de nas phyi nang khrus byas te/_/gtsang ma'i gos ni rab gon la/_/
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]dri zhim zas ni mur bzhin du/_/sems bskyed pas ni gzhan don mchog_/bdun po yongs su dag par bya'o/_/de nas srung ba'i 'khor lo nyid/_/ji ltar dmigs pa mkhas pas sgom/_/dri chab byin gyis brlabs la gzhag_/hUM hUM zhes pas rngam pa dang /_/oM badzra
[\[17a.2\]]rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM zhes pas/_g.yas brkyang ba yi gar gyis ni/_/g.yon brkyang stabs kyis g.yon nas bskor/_/bgegs rnams bskrad pa'i sbyor ba bya/_/phyogs bcur khro bo ti ra yi/_/nga rgyal ldan pas bsrung dang bcings/_/mtshams la sogs pa mkhas pas bshad/_/de nas lha
[\[17a.3\]]rnams bskyed pa ni/_/dkyil 'khor dbus kyi lte ba'i steng /_/hUM yig sngon po'i 'phro 'du las/_/mchod dang don gnyis rdzogs par byas/_/'dus pas gtso bo'i phyag mtshan ni/_/sna tshogs rdo rje ngos gcig med/_/dbus su rnam par bsam par bya/_/de rjes sngags 'di rnam par
[\[17a.4\]]brjod/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na maHsarba ta thA ga ta/_b+ha ku la bi sho d+ha nA ya swA hA/_zhes pa lan gsum brjod pa yis/_/rnam 'joms nyid kyi sku ru 'gyur/_/de nyid dam tshig phyag rgya ni/_/lag gnyis rdo rje bcings pa las/_/gung mo gnyis ni gshibs nas bsgreng /_/gshin rje
[\[17a.5\]]gshed kyi phyag rgya ste/_/gsang sngags 'di ni legs par ni/_/byang shar mtshams su gshin rje'o/_/oM ya mAn+ta kA ya swA hA/_yang snying lag gnyis sor mo dgod/_/snying gar rtse mo sprad pa yang /_/oM a nan+te swA hA/_zhes pas shar du mtha' yas bskyed/_/g.yon pa khu tshur
[\[17a.6\]]dkur brten pa/_/g.yas pa nu ma'i thad kar bzung /_/oM a mr-i te ba re hUM/_zhes pas shar lhor bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bskyed/_/lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las/_/g.yon pa'i mthe bong sbrel byas la/_/oM sum+b+ha ni ki ra ban+d+ha ri swA hA/_zhes pas lho ru gnod mdzes bskyed/_/lag
[\[17a.7\]]gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las/_/mdzub mo gnyis kyis srin lag mnan/_/gung mo sor mo mthe'u chung bsgreng /_/oM b+hi na ste badzra kro d+ha na kro d+ha swA hA/_zhes pas lho nub sngon mthong bskyed/_/snga ma'i phyag rgya lta bu la/_oM h+ya gr-I ba swA hA/_zhes pas nub tu rta mgrin bskyed/_/g.yon
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa las/_/g.yas pa'i khu tshur gnyis bsgrengs la/_/oM a pa ra dzi ta sa ta swA hA/_zhes pas nub byang gzhan gyis mi thub bskyed/_/lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las/_/mthe bong mthe'u chung gung mo ni/_/gshibs te so sor bsgreng byas la/_/oM
[\[17b.2\]]badzra pA Ni bAn pa ti swA hA/_zhes byas byang du gtum po'o/_/de nas so so'i phyag rgya bskyed/_/g.yon pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa dang /_/g.yas pa bcangs te spyi bor gzhag_/lag gnyis khu tshur snying gar brtsegs/_/g.yas pa'i mthe'u chung g.yon pas bcangs/_/lag gnyis
[\[17b.3\]]brdebs pa'i tshul du bya/_/de ltar rim pa nges pa yis/_/gru chad la ni go rims bzhin/_/sngags 'dis rgyal chen bzhi rim par gsal bar bskyed par bya'o/_/oM D+h+r-i ta rASh+TA ya swA hA/_oM bi rU D+ha kA ya swA hA/_oM bi rU pak+Sha ye swA hA/_oM bai shra ba NA ya swA hA/_zhes pa rgyal po bzhi
[\[17b.4\]]ru bskyed/_/de yi phyi rim snam bu la/_/bkra shis lha mo brgyad po'o/_/de yi phyi rim snam bu la/_/phyogs skyong ba ni de bzhin no/_/sgo bzhir sgo ma gzhan dang mthun/_/de dag sku mdog phyag mtshan ni/_/gtso bo'i sku mdog ljang ser la/_/g.yas pa rgya gram phyogs de ni/_/thugs
[\[17b.5\]]kar bzung ste g.yon pa yang /_/bum pa dku la brten pa'o/_/yang na phyag gnyis bum pa ni/_/sna tshogs rdo rjes kha bcad la/_/phyag gnyis bzung ste thugs kar 'dzin/_/mtha' yas zhal gsum sku mdog mthing /_/phyag drug nges med mtshon cha la/_/g.yon gyi 'og mas rtse dgu
[\[17b.6\]]ni/_/thugs kar 'dzin la nges pa'o/_/bdud rtsi 'khyil ba sku mdog dmar/_/zhal dang phyag gnyis sngar 'dra la/_/'og mas rdo rje rgya gram 'dzin/_/gnod mdzes mdog ser sngar bzhin la/_/'og mas tho ba thugs kar 'dzin/_/mi g.yo ba ni ljang gu la/_/rdo rje dbyug tho thugs
[\[17b.7\]]gar 'dzin/_/rta mgrin dmar po pad+ma 'dzin/_/gzhan gyis mi thub sngon po la/_/rin chen 'bar ba thugs kar 'dzin/_/gtum po smug nag rtse dgu 'dzin/_/gshin rje sngo nag zhal gsum pa/_/phyag drug nges med mtshon cha la/_/'og ma gnyis pos be con 'dzin/_/de nas grub
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]chad rgyal po bzhi/_/dkar ser dmar dang ljang gu la/_/be con pi wang chu srin dang /_/rin po che yi dong tse'o/_/lha mo rnams kyi sku mdog ni/_/gsal byed ma ni sngon mo la/_/zhal gcig phyag gnyis dpal be'u 'dzin/_/dbyangs can ma ni dkar mo la/_/rang
[\[18a.2\]]rtags g.yas pa 'khor lo'o/_/mdangs can ser mo pad+ma'o/_/'od ldan mthing ga rgyal mtshan no/_/skyes chen dmar mo gdu bu 'dzin/_/dri med pa ya dmar mo la/_/rang rtags g.yas pa bum pa 'dzin/_/yid bzangs ljang gu 'bud dung 'dzin/_/yid gzhungs ljang ser g.yung
[\[18a.3\]]drung 'dzin/_/phyogs skyong rnams kyi sku mdog ni/_/brgya byin dkar la rdo rje gdengs/_/me lha dmar po rin chen phreng /_/gshin rje mthing ga dbyug to bsnams/_/bden bral ljang gu ral gri'o/_/chu lha dmar po klu zhags bsnams/_/rlung lha dud ka be con 'dzin/_/gnod sbyin ser po
[\[18a.4\]]rin chen 'dzin/_/dbang ldan dkar ser tri shU la/_/nyi zla dkar po u dum+WAr/_/sa yi lha mo ser mo la/_/phyag na rin chen bum pa bsnams/_/sgo ma'i phyag mtshan sku mdog ni/_/lcags kyu dkar la lcags kyu 'dzin/_/zhags pa sngo la de bzhin zhags/_/lcags sgrog dmar
[\[18a.5\]]mo lcags sgrog 'dzin/_/dril bu ljang ser dril bu 'dzin/_/de ltar sku mdog gsal bsgoms la/_/ye shes dbang bskur dgug gzhug bstim/_/de ltar gzhal yas gsal dmigs la/_/snying po rgyas dang bsdus pa dang /_/shin tu bsdus pa gang mos la/_/brgya rtsa brgyad
[\[18a.6\]]du dbul bar bya/_/rdo rjes mchod pa lnga yang dbul/_/bsnyen pa'i dus su dmigs pa gsum/_/legs par brtags te mnyes par bya/_/sgrub pa bum pa nyid la'o/_/de nas bstod pa dbul ba'i phyir/_/chos kyi dbyings nas lha rnams ni/_/spyan drangs bum pa'i nang du bstim/_/bskul
[\[18a.7\]]tshig 'di skad brjod par bya/_/na mo sems ni rgya che mchog tu rab bskyed de/_/ma lus 'khor dang bcas te gshegs su gsol/_/chos dbyings mngon 'gyur ye shes sku brnyes te/_/sku gsung thugs su legs par 'byung ba'i gnas/_/gsung rab bcu gnyis 'phags lam rgyal ba'i
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]bka'/_/bcom ldan shes rab pha rol phyin la sogs/_/rnam dag dbyings kyi dam chos gshegs su gsol/_/sa bcu'i rgyal tshab chos la mnga' brnyes shing /_/snying rje chen pos brtson 'grus go gyon pa/_/shes rab thabs kyis khams gsum 'dren mdzad pa/_/rgyal sras byang
[\[18b.2\]]chub sems dpa' gshegs su gsol/_/mi mjed 'jig rten 'dzam gling 'dir/_/dpal tshogs bkra shis gzhal yas khang /_/bla med mchod pa'i rgyan bshams te/_/nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan bshams nas/_/spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol ba ni/_/bzhi bcom drug ldan 'khor ba
[\[18b.3\]]mya ngan 'das/_/nams kyang rdo rje lta bu'i sku mnga' ba'i/_/lus ngag yid gsum nyon mongs thams cad 'joms/_/'gro 'dul thugs rjes byin rlabs bsam mi khyab/_/bcom ldan rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa yang /_/'dir gshegs 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod pa bzhes/_/sems
[\[18b.4\]]can nyon mongs gshin rje'i dra ba la/_/ye shes thugs kyis gshed dang dra ba 'joms/_/sku gsung thugs kyi sprul pa 'byung ba yi/_/khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed po yang /_/'dir gshegs 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod pa bzhes/_/nam mkha'i mtha' ma mtha' yas thug pa
[\[18b.5\]]bzhin/_/'gro ba'i las dang nyon mongs mtha' yas la/_/thugs rje'i byin rlabs sprul pa mtha' yas kyis/_/ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du 'joms mdzad pa/_/khro bo'i rgyal po yon tan mtha' yas kyang /_/'dir gshegs 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod pa bzhes/_/sems can dug
[\[18b.6\]]gsum nad kyis gdungs pa la/_/thugs rje'i byin rlabs bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs pa/_/thabs la mkhas pa mdzad pa sna tshogs kyis/_/sems can ma lus dbyings su sbyor mdzad pa/_/khro bo'i rgyal po bdud rtsi thab sbyor yang /_/'dir gshegs 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod pa bzhes/_/
[\[18b.7\]]rnam thar gsum gyi mnga' mdzad ye shes stobs/_/nyon mongs dug gsum ma lus gnon mdzad phyir/_/phyag mtshan rdo rje tho ba 'bar ba bsnams/_/mdzes pa'i sku mdog gdul thabs cir yang ston/_/khro bo'i rgyal po gnod mdzes stobs po che/_/'dir gshegs 'gro ba'i
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]don phyir mchod pa bzhes/_/dbyings las mi g.yo 'khor ba'i mtha' mi g.yo/_/mtha' la mi gnas thugs rjes 'gro don mdzad/_/mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba'i mtha' gcod cing /_/sems can rnams kyi dpal dang mgon gyur pa/_/khro bo'i rgyal bo mi g.yo mgon po
[\[19a.2\]]yang /_/'dir gshegs 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod pa bzhes/_/ye shes thugs kyi 'khor ba'i mtha' yi bar/_/thugs rje myur bas rta gdong phrin las mdzod/_/'gro don mdzad pa'i ngo mtshar mnga' ba yang /_/rtag tu rta mgrin rgyal po gsung du sprul/_/khro bo'i rgyal po dbang gi rta gdong
[\[19a.3\]]yang /_/'dir gshegs 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod pa bzhes/_/bsod nams ye shes tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i sku/_/mtha' gnyis ma yengs dbyings la dbang sgyur zhing /_/thugs rjes phrin las dbyings su 'dus ma mdzad/_/sku yi yon tan rdzogs pas dbang phyug che/_/khro bo'i rgyal
[\[19a.4\]]po dbang phyug gtum po yang /_/'dir gshegs 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod pa bzhes/_/rin chen las grub ri rab ngos bzhi nas/_/bsod nams tshogs ldan dpal ldan rgyal chen bzhi/_/gling bzhir gnas pa'i sems can thams cad la/_/ji ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du don mdzad pa'i/_/dpal
[\[19a.5\]]ldan rgyal po chen po 'khor bcas kyang /_/'dir gshegs 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod pa bzhes/_/dus bzhi tshad med bzhi dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/_/mi 'jigs bzhi ldan ye shes tshogs rdzogs te/_/mchod pa mang po'i sprin dang bcas nas ni/_/mchod pa'i lha mo mang po gshegs su gsol/_/
[\[19a.6\]]rdo rje dang ni rin chen pad+ma dang /_/sna tshogs las grub rdo rje rgya gram 'bar/_/phyag rgya chen pos bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon/_/phyogs bzhi phyag rgya chen po gshegs su gsol/_/zhi ba dkar po 'od kyi dkyil 'khor nas/_/pad+ma dkar po phyag na dpal be'u bsnams/_/'joms byed
[\[19a.7\]]dkar po phyag na 'khor lo bsnams/_/gnyis med don la thugs sbyor gshegs su gsol/_/lho phyogs rgyas pa ser mo'i dkyil 'khor nas/_/rgyas pa sngon mo phyag na pad+ma bsnams/_/'od ldan mthing ga phyag na rgyal mtshan bsnams/_/gnyis med don la thugs sbyor gshegs
[\[19b\]]

[\[28a.2\]]bzhi la dar mthing nag gi cod pan gdags/_oM trA sa ya trA sa ya badzra kI li kI lA ya swA hA/_zhes shar sgor bcugs la rdo rje rigs kyi las thams cad pa'i khro bor bskyed do/_/oM ts+tshin+d+ha ts+tshir n+d+ha ma hA kI li kI lA ya swA hA/_zhes pas phur bu gcig lho sgor btsugs la rin po che'i rigs kyi
[\[28a.3\]]las thams cad pa'i khro bor bskyed do/_/oM tsu ru tsu ru tsaN+Da li kI li kI lA ya swA hA/_zhes pas pad+ma'i rigs kyi las thams cad pa'i khro bor bskyed la nub sgor gzugs so/_/oM b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha kro d+ha kI li kI lA ya swA hA/_byang sgor btsugs la las kyi rigs thams cad pa'i khro bor bskyed do/_/
[\[28a.4\]]dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhi la gtor ma sha sna tshogs pa dang ldan pa bzhi bzhag_/gzhan yang mchod pa'i bye brag ji ltar 'byor pa bsham/_phyogs skyong ba dang bgegs la sogs pa'i gtor ma btang zhing bar chad bsal ba'i sbyor ba bya'o/_/de nas sngags pa bdag nyid kyis bdud rtsi 'khyil
[\[28a.5\]]pa'i sngags kyis dkyil 'khor bsangs te/_lag pa rdo rje rtse gsum pa ltar bya ste/_g.yon 'khor lo'i snod thugs kar 'dzin par byas la shar gyi bum pa la dmigs te/_oM trA sa ya trA sa ya badzra kI li kI lA ya swA hA/_zhes brgya rtsa brgyad brjod pas/_khro bo badzra kI li kI lA ya mthing nag
[\[28a.6\]]zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/_g.yas pas rdo rje rtse gsum pa gdengs pa 'phyar ba/_g.yon pas 'khor los mtshan pa'i thod pa thugs kar 'dzin pa/_ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil ba/_thod pa dang sbrul gyis brgyan pa/_rigs lngas dbu brgyan pa/_spyan gsum pa zhal bgrad pa zhing
[\[28a.7\]]chen gyi yol bas bskor ba la dar nag gi 'phur lces brgyan pa/_stag dang gzig dang /_gcan gzan sna tshogs pas sku smad brgyan pa bum par bskyed do/_/lho phyogs kyi bum pa la dmigs te/_oM ts+tshin+d+ha ts+tshin+d+ha ma hA kI lI kI lA ya swA hA zhes brgya rtsa brgyad brjod pas kI la ya ser nag zhal
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]gcig phyag gnyis pa g.yas rin po che'i snye ma 'dzin pa/_g.yon phur bu thugs kar 'dril ba/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa snga ma bzhin du bskyed do/_/nub kyi bum pa la dmigs la g.yas pa sdong po ltar byas la/_g.yon phur pa ltar byas la/_oM tsu ru tsu ru tsaN+Da li kI li kI lA
[\[28b.2\]]ya swA hA/_zhes brgya rtsa brgyad brjod pas dmar po kI li kI lA ya dmar nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa g.yas me 'bar ba/_g.yon phur bu thugs kar 'dril ba/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa snga ma bzhin du bskyed do/_/byang du g.yas na rin po che'i dbyug to 'phyar ba ltar byas la/_g.yon
[\[28b.3\]]phur pa ltar byas la/_oM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha kro d+ha kI li kI lA ya swA hA zhes brgya rtsa brgyad brjod pas gtum po kI la ya mdog ljang nag g.yas rin po che'i dbyug to thod pas mtshan pa 'dzin pa/_g.yon phur bu thugs kar 'dzin pa snga ma dang 'dra bar bskyed do/_/dbus su rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa sku mdog
[\[28b.4\]]mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa g.yas 'khor lo g.yon phur pa bsnams pa/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_oM na mash+tsaN+Da badzra krod+hA ya swA hA bskyed do/_/de nas lha so so'i sems dpa' spyan drangs te/_gnyis su med par bstims la ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kar zla ba'i
[\[28b.5\]]dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rdo rje kha gyes pa'i bum par hUM/_de la so so'i sngags kyis bskor ba'i rang sgra la dmigs la/_bzlas pa brtsam par bya'o/_/oM na mash+tsaN+Da badzra kro d+hA ya hu lu hu lu/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha bad+d+hA ban+d+ha/_ha na ha na a mr-i te hUM phaT ces bum pa re re la stong phrag gsum bzlas te/_brgya

[\[29a.1\]]bzlas pa ji ltar bya ba'i lung bstan pa bzlas pa la dus thams cad du brtson par bya/_srung ba'i 'khor lo yang mgul du gdags so/_/bdud rtsi thab sbyor zhes bya ba khro bo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i cho ga zab mo dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad

[\[29a.3\]]bzhengs te/_sa stegs dkyil 'khor gru gsum mnyam zhing chags kyis 'thas par byas te thig btab la tshon bkye ste/_dbus pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi pa ste lte ba ljang gu pad+ma rigs kyi mdog lte ba'i mu khyud nag po rdo rje ra ba dkar pos bskor ba/_gong ras dmar po mu khyud ser po sna tshogs

[\[29a.6\]]gsol ba dang /_de nas lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang lcags sgrog dang dril bu'i phyag rgya bcings la/_oM badzra saM ku sha swA hA/_oM badzra pA sha swA hA/_oM badzra sboT swA hA/_oM badzra g+haN+Di swA hA zhes so so'i bum pa la dmigs te/_lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu brjod pas shar phyogs kyi bum par pad+ma dang
[\[29a.7\]]zla ba'i steng du/_dzaHlas lha mo mdog dkar mo'i lag na lcags kyu thogs pa zhal bag tsam khro ba rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_skra ser po gyen la brdzes pa/_spyan dmar po bskyed do/_/lhor hUM las lha mo ser mo rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan pa/_phyag na rdo rje zhags pa rtse gsum pas
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]mtshan pa thogs pa thod pas brgyan pa bskyed do/_/nub tu baM las lha mo dmar mo phyag na lcags sgrog nyi zlas mtshan pa bskyed do/_/byang du hoHlas lha mo ljang ser lag na dril bu dkrol ba bskyed la/_de dag gi snyeng gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du so so'i ye shes sems dpa'

[\[29b.3\]]dmigs te/_khri phrag re bzlas te stong gis mchod pa 'bul/_spyan drang ba dang bzhugs su gsol ba dang /_phyag btsal ba dang bstod pa re bya/_de ltar bzlas pa byas la lha so so 'od du zhu chu bdud rtsir gyur pa las lha mo grangs med pa 'phros pa las/_phyi nang gi dbang bdag la bskur
[\[29b.4\]]bar dmigs la/_de nas slob ma bskyed pa la sogs pa byas la dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dbang bskur bar bya'o/_/de nas ba liM gtang /_bkra shis gsol/_dkyil 'khor bsdu/_slob mas bla ma la yon dbul/_sgom bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i cho ga_/rin po
[\[29b.5\]]che dri ma med pa zhes bya ba dpal mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ {D2951}]@##/_/dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bar [#]'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/_gnas khang yid dang mthun par

[\[32a.3\]]bzhi dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/_/de nas bum pa dgu la so so'i mtshan ma btab la gnas su gzhag par bya'o/_/grwa rnams su phur bu dang rdo rje skud pas sbrel la mkhas pas gzugs so/_/de ltar byas [#]pa so so'i gnas su mtshan ma bris te/_ngos bzhir [#]rdo rje dang rin po che dang /_pad+ma

[\[145a.3\]]'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang dam tshig la rnam par blta ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs bklags shing /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i mchod rten brgya rtsa brgyad tshul bzhin du btab cing mchod/_bcom ldan 'das ma shes
[\[145a.4\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang /_'dus pa chen po rin po che'i tog dang /_gtsug na rin po che'i tog la sogs pa ste/_theg pa chen po'i mdo sde dang /_gsung rab zab cing rgya che ba klag cing mchod de/_gdan 'dzom pa
[\[145a.5\]]chen po'i gleng gzhir gsol nas/_che ge mo la sogs pa 'gro ba mang po'i gnod pa dang sdug bsngal ba thams cad zhi bar bgyi ba dang /_phan pa dang bde ba bla na med pa thob par bgyi ba'i don chen por bsgrub pa'i mgon skyabs dang dpung gnyen du gsol zhing mchis na/_'phags
[\[145a.6\]]pa'i mthu dpal dang /_thugs rje bsam gyis mi khyab pa mnga' ba rnams kyis sngon gyi smon lam khyad par can dang /_thugs dam bzang po'i dbang du mdzad de/_phongs shing nyam thag pa'i sems can skyabs su gsol ba rnams la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/_bdag cag dge 'dun

[\[145b.1\]]'dir gdan 'dzom pa chen po mdzad de/_mchod pa bzhes shing ji ltar sngon cho ga gang tshul gang gis byin gyis brlabs te mdzad pa bzhin du/_de yang cho ga yongs su rdzogs par mdzad de/_byin gyis brlab cing chos kyi de kho na nyid gtan la dbab pa la sogs te/_thabs mkhas pa'i

[\[184b.1\]]kyis me tog thogs la/_rgyal mtshan nam/_sku dang dkyil 'khor bcas pa la yang stod pa byed cing bskor ba bya/_nad gdon zhi ba'i gsol ba gdab/_bzod par gsol/_ye shes pa gshegs/_dam tshig pa bsdu/_gtor ma gnod byed kyi phyogs su btang la/_bkra

[\[299b.2\]]de skad lan bdun bzlas/_skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor ba dbul/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/_/de skad lan bdun bzlas/_
[\[299b.3\]]skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul/_ston pa bcom ldan 'das dpal shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/_/de skad lan bdun bzlas/_skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 'jam dpal la
[\[299b.4\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/_/de skad lan bdun bzlas/_skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyabs grol la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/_/de skad lan bdun bzlas/_skabs 'dir mchod
[\[299b.5\]]pa ci 'byor pa dbul/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/_/de skad lan bdun bzlas/_skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang /_
[\[299b.6\]]'phags skyes po dang /_mig mi bzang dang /_ku be ra la sogs pa'i chos skyong ba lha'i dge bsnyen thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/_/skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul/_mthu dpal dang ldan pa'i dge bsnyen dam pa/_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon bcu
[\[299b.7\]]gnyis la 'di lta ste/_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po ji 'jigs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/_/gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/_/gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rgyan 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mchod do

[\[300a.1\]]skyabs su mchi'o/_/gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gza' 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/_/gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rlung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/_/gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gnas bcas la

[\[300a.5\]]mchi'o/_/de skad lan bdun bzlas/_skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor ba dbul/_ston pa bcom ldan 'das dpal shAkya thub pas bdag cag la sogs pa sems can las kyi sgrib pa sna tshogs kyis bsgribs pa/_nad sna tshogs kyis lus gzir ba/_mya ngan dang sdug bsngal sna
[\[300a.6\]]tshogs kyis gtses pa/_phongs par gyur pa thams cad rjes su bzung zhing lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /_phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi thabs mkhas pa dang /_sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas par byin gyis brlabs shing /_dpal gyi mgur nas
[\[300a.7\]]yang dag par gsungs nas/_phan yon dpag tu ma mchis pa/_rgyas pa bka' stsal pa/_'di ltar nyi zla ni dog sar lhung yang gda'/_ri rab ri'i rgyal po ni gnas 'pho yang gda'/_rgya mtsho chen po ni dus las yol yang gda'/_dogs ni nam mkhar 'gyur/_chab ni zhugs su
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]'gyur/_zhugs ni chab tu 'gyur/_bser ma ni zhags bas gzung du rung bar yang gda'i/_lha dang mi'i ston pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs pa/_sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi kun du spyod pa la yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' ba de bzhin
[\[300b.2\]]gshegs pas legs par gsungs pa'i bka' ni gzhan du 'gyur ba ma mchis pa lags na/_che ge mo la sogs pa'i don du dpal gyi mgur nas gsungs pa'i mdo sde las 'byung ba'i tshul bzhin du/_de bzhin gshegs pa bdun dang /_ston pa bde bar gshegs pa rnams gdan 'dzom
[\[300b.3\]]pa'i spyan sngar mchod pa ci 'byor pa bshams te/_mchod nas smon lam du gsol pa/_dngos ci thog pa'i nyams kyis dpags te bgyis pa 'di tsam zhig sngon ji ltar byin gyis brlabs shing bka' stsal pa bzhin du/_da yang gdan 'dzom pa chen pos cho ga yongs su rdzogs par bskang ste/_
[\[300b.4\]]byin gyis brlab cing phan yon ji skad bka' stsal pa bdag cag la sogs pa sems can thams cad kyis 'phral du thob par mdzad cing stsal bar ci gnang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yang dag pa tshad mar gyur ba/_'gyur ba mi mnga' ba'i bden pa mngon sum du bstan pa ci gnang /_
[\[300b.5\]]spyir mchod pa dbul zhing bsod nams dmigs kyis/_bsngo ba'i smon lam gdab/_'phags pa gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan sngar mchod pa ci 'byor ba dbul/_de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo sde las 'byung ba bzhin du mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho
[\[300b.6\]]brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che dang /_zla ba dang /_pad+mas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po
[\[300b.7\]]dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzangs dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med mchog dpal dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho mchog gi blos rnam par rol pa mngon
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]par mkhyen pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla be+e DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po dang /_ston pa bcom ldan 'das dpal shAkya thub pa 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs nas/_mtshan nas brjod de phyag 'tshal ba dang /_mchod cing 'phags pa de dag gi smon lam khyad par can dang /_
[\[301a.2\]]bka' lung mthun par smon lam gsol ba dang /_gzhan yang 'phags pa de dag gi spyan sngar sdig pa bshags pa dang /_rjes su yi rang phul ba dang /_bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa la sogs pa'i bsod nams ci mchis pa'i stobs dang /_'phags pa de dag gi mthu dpal dang /_byin gyi
[\[301a.3\]]rlabs kyis lha'i sras kyi zhal snga nas kyi thog ma ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba nas bsags pa'i dngos sdig dang /_sgrib pa ci mnga' ba thams cad byang bar gyur cig_/sku la bsnyun mi mnga' zhing /_sku tshe dpag tu med par ring ba dang /_dbu rmog btsan pa dang /_chab srid 'byam par rgya che zhing 'jig
[\[301a.4\]]rten dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i dpal phun sum tshogs pa la mnga' brnyes par gyur cig_/mthar yang tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i g.yung drung gi sku chos kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi go 'phang brnyes par gyur cig_/chabs 'og tu gtogs pa'i 'bangs thams
[\[301a.5\]]cad kyang phyi nang gi gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi zhing /_bde zhing skyid pa dang /_'phral yun du legs pa'i chos bzang po la gnas par gyur cig_/mnga' ris kyi yul khams thams cad du yang mi nad dang /_phyugs nad dang /_lo nyes dang /_dgra'i tshogs la sogs pa'i gnod pa dang /_bkra
[\[301a.6\]]mi shis pa'i bag ci yang mi 'byung ba dang /_char chu dus su bab ste/_lo phyugs 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang /_bde skyid kyi dpal phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur cig_/dam pa'i chos ring du gnas shing sgo thams cad nas dar zhing rgyas par gyur cig_/sgo'i bsod nams bgyid pa la mjug

[\[301b.1\]]po dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che dang /_zla ba dang pad+mas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzangs dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med mchog dpal dang /_de bzhin

[\[301b.3\]]'dzom pa spyan drangs nas mtshan nas brjod pa dang /_phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa dang /_mdo dang mthun par smon lam gsol ba dang /_che ge mo la sogs pa 'gro ba mang po'i don mdzad par gsol ba'i skabs 'dir/_bdag cag dus ngan pa'i sems can spyod pa dman zhing ma dag par
[\[301b.4\]]gyur pas ma 'tshal ba dang /_bag ma mchis pa la sogs pa'i dbang gis/_lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi spyod pa thams cad nyon mongs pa rnams dang 'dres pa dang /_mchod pa'i dngos po chung zhing ngan la gtsang sbras ma phye ba dang /_mdo las 'byung ba'i cho ga bzhin du ma lcogs pa la
[\[301b.5\]]sogs pa 'khrul zhing nongs par gyur pa thams cad 'phags pa thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa thams cad la bzod par gsol zhing mchis na/_thugs brtse bar mdzad de bzod par bzhes shing 'phral yun gnyis su bdag cag la sgrib pa dang gnod par mi 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab par
[\[301b.6\]]ci gnang /_'phags pa rnams kyis deng ngam dgung 'di'i bar du bdag cag la sogs pa 'gro ba phongs shing nyam thag pa'i sems can thams cad kyi phan pa dang bde ba'i don mdzad cing /_bka' stsal pa yang da dung yang bdag cag la thugs brtse bas yang dang yang du gdan 'dzom par
[\[301b.7\]]mdzad par dgongs shing /_so so'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa rnams su 'gro ba'i don la gshegs par ci gnang /_mjug 'dir bsngo ba'i tshigs bcad kyang bklag go/_/rdzogs so//[ {D3135}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_d+hA ra NI sarba sA d+ha na kra ma dwa ya nA ma/_bod
